title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid details.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Fill in all mandatory fields with valid information.
Submit the registration form.
Verify the user account is created and user is redirected to the authenticated landing page.

title: User Registration with Invalid Data
description: Verify registration fails with invalid or incomplete data and appropriate error messages are shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Submit registration with empty required fields.
Verify validation errors are displayed for missing fields.
Submit registration with invalid email format.
Verify an error message indicates invalid email format.

title: User Login Success
description: Check that users can log in successfully with correct credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Enter valid username/email and password.
Click login button.
Confirm login succeeds and user is taken to authenticated area.

title: User Login Failure
description: Check login fails with invalid credentials and appropriate error messages are shown.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Enter invalid username/email or password.
Click login button.
Confirm login fails and error message about invalid credentials appears.

title: User Logout
description: Ensure users can securely logout and end their session.

steps.description: Login as a valid user.
Click the logout button/link.
Verify the user is logged out and redirected to the public landing page.

title: Browse Product Catalog
description: Verify users can browse product listings with pagination and category filters.

steps.description: Navigate to the products listing page.
Browse product pages and navigate between pages.
Verify products display correctly with images and titles.
Apply a category filter from the sidebar.
Verify the product list updates to show only filtered category items.

title: Search Products by Keyword
description: Verify the search bar returns appropriate products based on user queries.

steps.description: Navigate to the products page.
Enter a product name or keyword in the search bar.
Submit the search query.
Verify the results list contains relevant products matching the keyword.

title: View Product Detail with Variants
description: Ensure users can view detailed product information including variant options.

steps.description: Select a product from listing.
Confirm product detail page loads with description, images, and variant selectors.
Change product variant selection.
Verify price and availability update accordingly.

title: Add Product to Shopping Cart
description: Verify users can add a product with selected variant to the shopping cart.

steps.description: On the product detail page, select desired variant and quantity.
Click 'Add to Cart' button.
Confirm the product is added to the cart and cart count updates.

title: Update Shopping Cart Item Quantity
description: Verify users can update quantity of a product in their shopping cart.

steps.description: Navigate to the shopping cart page.
Change the quantity of a cart item to a valid number.
Verify cart totals update correctly and quantity persists.

title: Remove Item from Shopping Cart
description: Ensure users can remove items from their shopping cart.

steps.description: Navigate to the shopping cart page.
Remove an item from the cart.
Verify the item is removed and cart updates accordingly.

title: Complete Checkout with Valid Payment
description: Verify checkout process completes with valid payment details and order is created.

steps.description: Ensure shopping cart has items.
Navigate to the checkout page.
Fill in valid payment and shipping information.
Submit the order.
Confirm order creation success and user is shown order confirmation.

title: Checkout with Payment Failure
description: Verify the checkout process handles payment failures gracefully with error messages.

steps.description: Add items to the shopping cart.
Navigate to checkout page.
Enter invalid or declined payment information.
Submit the payment.
Verify payment failure is handled and user is notified with appropriate message.

title: View Order History
description: Verify authenticated users can view their past orders and order details.

steps.description: Login as a registered user with existing orders.
Navigate to the Orders page.
Confirm list of past orders is displayed with correct order info.
Select an order to view details.
Verify order details page displays items, status, and payment info accurately.

title: Vendor Registration and Profile Creation
description: Ensure vendors can successfully register and create their profiles.

steps.description: Navigate to vendor registration page.
Complete the vendor registration form with required information.
Submit the registration form.
Verify vendor profile is created and vendor is redirected to dashboard.

title: Vendor Dashboard Profile Editing
description: Check vendors can edit and update their profile information from the dashboard.

steps.description: Login as a vendor user.
Navigate to the vendor dashboard profile edit section.
Modify profile details such as business description or contact info.
Save changes.
Verify changes persist and updated profile is displayed correctly.

title: Add and Manage Vendor Products
description: Ensure vendors can add new products with variants and manage existing listings correctly.

steps.description: Login as a vendor.
Navigate to vendor dashboard product management.
Add a new product including variants and descriptions.
Save the product.
Verify the product appears in vendor listings and marketplace catalog.
Edit an existing product's information.
Confirm changes are reflected in product detail views.

title: Add Product Review and Rating
description: Verify authenticated users can submit product reviews and ratings after purchase.

steps.description: Login as a user who purchased a product.
Navigate to that product's page.
Submit a review with rating and comment.
Verify the review is saved and displayed on the product page.

title: Wishlist Add and Remove Products
description: Verify users can add products to wishlist and remove them as needed.

steps.description: Login as a user.
Navigate to a product detail page.
Add the product to the wishlist.
Verify product appears in the user's wishlist.
Remove the product from the wishlist.
Confirm the wishlist no longer lists the product.

title: User Profile Update
description: Verify users can update profile details including address, payment methods, and notification settings.

steps.description: Login and navigate to profile management page.
Update address details.
Verify address updates persist.
Add/edit payment methods.
Verify payment method updates save correctly.
Change notification preferences.
Confirm notification settings are saved and applied.

title: Offline Support and PWA Installation Prompt
description: Verify the app functions offline with cached data and shows the PWA install prompt when appropriate.

steps.description: Load the app online and navigate several pages to cache data.
Go offline (simulate network disconnection).
Verify previously visited pages load correctly offline.
Verify the PWA install prompt appears based on supported device triggers.

title: Protected Routes Access Control
description: Verify protected routes redirect unauthorized users to login and allow access for authenticated users.

steps.description: Attempt to directly access a protected page while logged out.
Confirm redirection to login page.
Login with valid credentials.
Navigate to the protected page.
Verify access is granted and page content is displayed.

title: Navigation Bar and Footer Responsiveness
description: Verify navigation bar and footer components are responsive and function correctly on various screen sizes.

steps.description: Resize browser window or simulate devices of different widths.
Verify navigation bar elements adjust layout without overflow or clipping.
Verify footer displays all elements properly and remains accessible.
Click navigation links and verify correct page loads without errors.

title: Error Boundary Handling
description: Ensure the error boundary component captures runtime errors and displays a user-friendly message without breaking the app.

steps.description: Simulate a runtime error inside a child component.
Verify the error boundary displays fallback UI with error details or friendly message.
Verify the app does not crash and navigation is still functional.

title: Static Informational Pages Load
description: Verify static pages like About, Terms, Privacy, and FAQs load successfully and display correct content.

steps.description: Navigate to each static informational page.
Confirm pages load without errors and content is accurate and readable.

title: Form Input Validation and Feedback
description: Verify all forms validate user input and provide actionable feedback for invalid data.

steps.description: Open various forms such as registration, login, checkout, and profile edit.
Enter invalid inputs such as empty fields, wrong formats, and invalid characters.
Verify validation messages appear guiding the user to correct issues.
Correct the inputs and resubmit the forms.
Confirm forms submit successfully after valid inputs.
